Posts.Content: I do not think that one response was meant for this thread. That poor fellow had colon cancer from that ID thread on this site.
Posts.Title: Has anyone used PRMA Plastic Surgery in TX?

Posts.Content: I might add I did not save my nipples. I am very happy with how the reconstructed ones look. I have feeling in my breasts but not yet in my nipples. I have way more feeling than I anticipated.
Posts.Title: Has anyone used PRMA Plastic Surgery in TX?

Posts.Content: Hi. I found PRMA because I live in Texas. I was going to look into the place in New Orleans but since this one was so close I looked into it. I was extremely happy with my choice. Dr. Nastala was my doctor. I had a double mastectomy and DIEP Flap surgery. I am a higher BMI (37) and this was a huge success. I had no issues. The staff and hospital were excellent. I highley recommend PRMA.
